title: RP Change?, bug [Client]

replies.body:
Hey Thespaggetimaghn,

I looked into your account, and saw that you were purchasing with Canadian Dollars which means you received the proper amount of RP. A few months ago, we changed the value per dollar with CAD. You can read more about this [here!](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/community/prepaid-cards)

Please let me know if you have any other questions.
